## Introduction

Welcome to the **Food Security and Insecurity Dashboard**.  
This dashboard explores **patterns of food security and insecurity** using data from the H3-FPCUK survey.  

### **What is Food Security?**
Food security means having reliable access to **enough affordable, nutritious food**.  
Conversely, food insecurity occurs when individuals **struggle to afford or access food**, leading to **poor diet quality, skipped meals, or hunger**.
